about_page.what_we_do:
"From our own traveling experiences. We feel that the things that become the most meaningfulto us are not the souvenirs from our trips but it is the stories, experiences andknowledge that makes us who we are."
 
   We noticed that our home town has a number professional locals that offers truly authentic and rewarding activities that would be perfect for tourist to experience when visiting our country. The only problem is that these people are hard to discover because they are not commercialise or presented in brochures. Most of them are not tech savvy, don't have their own website or even social media presence.
 
  Joininglocals aims to provide a centralise educational travel platform where tourist can search and book unique and empowering activities, courses and workshops based on their interest and on the other hand help promote our beloved community by offering a channel for skilful locals to connect with you.
about_page.our_services: We gather the best professional locals artist, guides, host and instructors that offer learning activities, workshop, and courses in both traditional and contemporary skills. We aim to handpick the best activities that will offer you the best experience and knowledge, so we can guarantee you will have a memorable time while you stay in our beloved city.
